scripts.deploy: npm run dep-merge-build && npm run dep-add-commit && npm run dep-push && npm run checkout-main
scripts.dep-merge-build: git checkout gh-pages && git merge main --no-edit && npm run build
scripts.dep-add-commit: git add dist -f && git commit -m "Deployment commit"
scripts.dep-push: git subtree push --prefix dist origin gh-pages
